nodes.text: Janor was a female lieutenant who served in the Republic Army during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire, when she was stationed the space station Carrick Station.

The Operations Gear Vendor for the Trooper class, Lieutenant Janor was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of Game Update 2.4 on October 1, 2013, along with the other Operations Gear Vendors. He was later removed as a vendor and NPC in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system. Nonetheless, he remains in the game, as his character model is used as part of the background environment in the redesigned fleet areas.
